name: back-end
description: This repo contains the backend code for UPRI earthquake monitoring system

scripts.start:help: echo 'Runs node server index.js, and expects process.env to be runtime-export-ed in the environment'
scripts.start:dev:help: echo 'Runs nodemon on index.js, and expects process.env to come from an available .env file. NOTE: runtime-exported env-vars may overwrite process.env'
scripts.test:help: echo 'Runs tests against Jest, and expects process.env to come from an available .env file. NOTE: runtime-exported env-vars may overwrite process.env'
